website_summaries.verdict: The S+ offers accurate tracking and insightful sleep data that any insomniac will appreciate.
pros: The S+ by ResMed can accurately track your sleep without a wristband or a mattress pad
The app (Android and iOS) offers detailed information each day on your sleep habits and provides feedback to help improve your sleep
cons: Sleep tracking isn't automatic and the device is expensive for something that only tracks your nighttime activities
The tracker can also be confused by someone else sharing the bed or if you move out of range of the sensor

customer_reviews.title: SERVERS SHUT DOWN, USELESS!!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!! As of June 14th, it appears Resmed has shut down servers and support for this device. You will not be able to register on the app, rendering it useless. I purchased mine in September 2015, and received no prior notice of them shutting down. UPDATE:BEWARE! After finding I was unable to log in any more, and several exchanges with "Customer Service," NOW when I reply to and old customer service, I receive "customerservice wasn't found at mysplus.com" Message rejected. As I said before, they are being sneaky about dropping all support for the S+.
customer_reviews.author: jsielke

customer_reviews.title: Item Will Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Carefully consider this email from ResMed before you decide to purchase: “Hi, please return the device for a refund if possible. ResMed has stopped selling the S+ from its official sites as we're phasing it out. There is a known issue with the app which is ongoing currently. Please let us know your refund status. If you're looking forward to obtaining a sleep monitoring device such as S+, we recommend you look at Sleep Score Max which is a successor product for S+. S+ is being phased out and there are no latest updates on the app. Thank you, ResMed S+ Customer Service"
customer_reviews.author: Karl R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This device bathes you in 10ghz RF while giving hopelessly vague guidance such as keep the lights low, the temperature cool, and avoid loud noises to sleep better. Support is non-existent. There's no phone number to reach anyone with questions, and my emails to the technical support line were ignored.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to make it work
customer_reviews.text: In order to be able to use the device, you need to have the mobile app on your phone. That was easy. For the app to run, you need an account on a specific server for that product. That was impossible. The server is no longer in operation. Without an account the app does not work, and without the app the item does not work. Basically I bought a ... brick 😤 If anyone knows a way to solve the problem for the item to work, I am more than happy to know.
customer_reviews.author: Polneo

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell when I'm awake
customer_reviews.text: If I'm laying in bed unable to sleep, but laying still, it says I'm sleeping. If it can't even tell when I'm awake or not, how can I trust that it can differentiate between light, deep, and REM sleep? I was hopeful that with ResMed's background in sleep devices they would have the ability to make a reliable device. Unfortunately, false information is worse than no information.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: I called customer service and encountered the most unbelievably annoying SERIES of phone trees EVER
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for sleep reports, but can be extremely temperamental. And it will TAKE OVER YOUR PHONE. It pops up constantly and wants you to answer the sleep questions. I called customer service and encountered the most unbelievably annoying SERIES of phone trees EVER. Kept hitting "O" and FINALLY got to a live person. Told her the problem and she went to check with someone. Came back to tell me that my particular product was only handled via email. Gave me the email address, and I emailed them. That was 2 weeks ago and I never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C. Arkuszewski

customer_reviews.title: Cannot believe Amazon is still trying to sell outdated items
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in 2017 found out they (resmed) no loncger support this when it quit working, without notice. But the MySplus.com is still touting it's amazing capabilities and selling [even directing buyers to amazon to purchase] What a rip off
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A

customer_reviews.title: Works reasonably well.  But... see update
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work reasonably well. It stopped working after about 5 months, but after some phone calls the manufacturer sent a replacement product. The user interface gives good information. One thing is that you need to set it before you go to sleep; I often forget to do so. Would be even better if it automatically engaged when you are going to sleep. Update - my replacement stopped working as well. Seems this product has a short life before it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: RodF

customer_reviews.title: Some syncing issues but still love it!
customer_reviews.text: This has helped coach me to fall asleep better. I wake up refreshed! The sleep coach has really made a difference in my life. There has been some syncing issues when turning the alarms off but for the price it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: It’s great until it stops working.
customer_reviews.text: My brother has a Res Med S+ and I was very impressed with its tracking ability without making a sound, so I bought one. After 4 mos it started sporadically not working/syncing with the app. Before 6 mos. was up it wasn’t even coming on period, so I am seriously doubting the quality. I tried tech support but only received a cookie cutter response. On the plus side - great sleep tracking you can take to the doctors office. Fairly effortless to use with the app. Soundless. On the con side. Unreliable interface with the app and cheaply made. It has to sit level with your head, so the green/red light depending can be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Looper

customer_reviews.title: Nice device
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice device to help you keep track of your sleep and quality of sleep. My biggest complaint with that is that it silences any notifications that I get during the night. I have another medical device and app from which I need to receive notifications during the night and they are silenced when I use the S+'s app.
customer_reviews.author: Eyesee

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working - So Surprised and Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Like several have noted, I had mine for two days and it's stopped working entirely. Customer support gives a 72 hour response guarantee but that's just silly. I don't want to wait three days to have them tell me if they can get this working again, so I'm returning the item. Bummer too as I really wanted this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Tausha

customer_reviews.title: Is NEW always better? I want to see the science!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a second S+, as connector became marginal. As electronics engineer, I may succeed in repairing a back up to my new one. During a formal sleep study that I paid an $800 co-pay for Medicare, the attendant said I was very hard to monitor. Sometimes the learning curve is steep and aggressive. I am improving. I got a 93% last night, though in 7 hours, I went through rapid transitions. You can never catch up on lost sleep. I use tools like S+ to monitor my circadian rhythm. I survived because I became my own physician with much guidance.
customer_reviews.author: radrevdwh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product...for its time
customer_reviews.text: For those who can't wear a smartwatch in their sleep, this is (was) a great 5 star alternative. I used both for a couple of years and the results were almost identical. Sadly, this device no longer appears to be supported. For those who can sleep in their smartwatches, this is a Don't Buy. For others, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: No Dice

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent device, by far the best available at the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent device, by far the best available at the price. It is a bit confusing setting it up, and the initial set up takes some time. After you get the setup finished and learn how to use the device it offers an extremely in depth view of how you are sleeping at night. I don't believe you can get more information from any other single device in your home, outside of having a professional sleep study done.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Edens

customer_reviews.title: Never 100%
customer_reviews.text: I have used this monitor every night since I received it in April 2017. It’s very easy to use and seems to match up with how I feel upon waking as far as getting enough deep sleep, REM, etc. The only thing that bothers me is that it subtracts points if I sleep more than about 7 1/2 hours. I think it’s because of my age, 70+. It says that most people my age average 6 1/2 hours per night. I have slept eight hours per night most of my adult life and sometimes 8 1/2. Apparently the S+ thinks I sleep too much. I often score in the 96 to 98 range but never 100%
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this little device. It's much more comfortable than the wired device I replaced. I've had no issues with it and it seems accurate. Its sleep advice is not very robust, but that's not what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: ChihuahuaMan

customer_reviews.title: Beware of software problem!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this device for 2 months. I really think this was a fantastic device and it was very accurate UNTIL I couldn’t use it anymore. I cannot login online or through my app. I have contacted support and they gave me a suggestion for troubleshooting which did not work, they said it also may have something to do with the new IOS software update. It’s been one week, no fix and not eligible for money back return. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I don't know ow how it works ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I don't know ow how it works but it tracks your sleep and breaks it down between all the different stages. You get charts to show your sleep stages. It also gives you tips to improve your sleep. . My husband and I have both used and you can see a definite difference between his sleep and mine
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Boutwell

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the device on Amazon and received it a week ago. Its takes about 30 min. to pair the device with my Samsung Galaxy 7 phone after much trial and error each night. The manual doesn't say much but turn the unit on and off. They really mean unplug and replug since there is no on off switch. That's the only problem that I have had so far. A major one ofcourse though. Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: A must have for those who have a problem sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: It's well worth the money. If you have a problem sleeping and have to figure that out this product is a great help. My problem was getting little to no R.E.M. Sleep. Now I don't want to stop sleeping!!
customer_reviews.author: Semi-Smart Comsumer

customer_reviews.title: Better than wearable, accurate, no auto function
customer_reviews.text: More accurate then any of the wearable sleep devices. It tracks breathing plus full body movement so can better calculate your sleeping state. I wouldn't know if it's 100pc accurate (how would you), but it always picks up the times I've woken up in the night (unlike my fitbit and misfit). I highly recommend. Only down side is no automatic sleep tracking (have to spend 30s each night initializing on your phone)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to forget and then I have a gap in ...
customer_reviews.text: It works quite well although I really doubt the quality of the data. It says I woke up 5 times during the night. Did I? I have no way to verify the data I am getting. It could also be affect by my wife in the bed next to me, even though it is not pointed at her. My other complaint is that I have to start up the app every night. It is easy to forget and then I have a gap in my data.
customer_reviews.author: T. N.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this product, it is unobtrusive, and really tracks your sleep very well. Even when my partner is sleeping next to me, it doesn't pick up his movements or when he gets up before me. Also, the advice that it gives you is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Wells

customer_reviews.title: Really, Improve Your Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Buy whatever bed you want, this is an excellent sleep technology not exclusive to some sleep number. It is not perfect but still very good and the advice is great. Will probably buy another for the city apartment, not terribly convenient for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: MUWalt

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT NO LONGER SUPPORTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the product or the app to work. Got a lame error message. Had someone else try it and same thing. Called customer service and they said sorry, that product and app are no longer supported. Huh? And they are still selling it on Amazon? DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: B. Aho

customer_reviews.title: Simply does not work. Had my doubts after nightly ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply does not work. Had my doubts after nightly comparison to my fitness tracker that tracks sleep stages - then went to a sleep lab for a study to check for sleep apnea, and set this up by the side of my bed, then compared to study results - not even close. REM was 25% in lab vs.14% on ResMed, lab said I was asleep for 5h 20m, RedMed said 4h 4m. Enough said. Unfortunately it's too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: frank brown

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since April 2018 and it helps me a lot improving my sleep quality. Never had an issue with it and it still working as of today January 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Siper

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly accurate device for the price especially considering it does not make contact with your skin or bed in any way. Incredibly useful mentoring from the app as it learns you. Charts provide useful and easy to follow sleep studies. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Christian White

customer_reviews.title: After downloading the application for my iPhone6, the software ...
customer_reviews.text: After downloading the application for my iPhone6, the software would not connect to the internet. I did all the usual reboots, reloads and change passwords. No luck with my phone. When I called tech support, they said to email them. When I emailed them, they never wrote back.
customer_reviews.author: William Odbert

customer_reviews.title: seems to be about the same results most nights even ...
customer_reviews.text: seems to be about the same results most nights even if I didnt sleep well. not sure the information helps but product performed ok. Just think about your goal before buying. For me I found out my sleep pattern then really didnt need any longer
customer_reviews.author: Reviewman

customer_reviews.title: Needs work
customer_reviews.text: Seems fairly accurate, but can't be sure. Has to be unplugged nightly and reset to work. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: u will love it. It helps with my sleep
customer_reviews.text: Buy it, u will love it. It helps with my sleep. It shows me my crazy sleeping patterns
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Romaine

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible With All Phones
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have known before I had to pay postage to send it back
customer_reviews.author: norina

customer_reviews.title: Buggy Cell Phone App Makes this Product Useless
customer_reviews.text: This product requires an app on your phone to function. I recommend reading the reviews for the iPhone App before buying, the reviews are very bad. Without a functioning cell phone app, this product is useless. The app is clunky and buggy, it keeps dropping sync with the unit so you'll wake up in the morning to an error on your phone and no sleep data. The company seems completely unresponsive to fixing the app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USELESS
customer_reviews.text: Useless. I used this monitor for two months. The monitor claims to identify the various states of sleep: Awake, Light, Deep, Rem. It cannot distinguish between the basics: Sleep vs Awake. On several occasions I simply lay very still in bed waiting to fall asleep for over an hour. The monitor reported Light Sleep. Another time my wife woke me up because I was thrashing around from a dream. The monitor reported Awake. I have no confidence in any of its results, and especially the Deep and Rem state reporting. The most this monitor will tell you is whether you are moving or still. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Lanni

customer_reviews.title: Cant register the item
customer_reviews.text: I have downloaded the app on my phone and i can not log in. The customer service is awful and will not help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fisher

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: How can this be sold and by Amazon?? You need an App to use the unit... and no App exists for Apple or Android! Buyer seriously beware! Amazon - remove this product!
customer_reviews.author: Blair W.

customer_reviews.title: ATTENTION: CPAP users & INSOMNIACS • Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: For real INSOMNIACS or CPAP users. Gives lots of data, accurate to the minute. Has “Mind Clear” something u don’t want to forget, dictate, type while dosing. “Smart Alarm” gently wakes u when NOT in deep sleep. Compare with CPAP data. For the price, can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: 3Paws

customer_reviews.title: Complete piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Worked intermittently for a few months, lots of problems with the app and syncing. Now after 5 months it stops its recording after a few hours of sleep. Complete piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Brandon F.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My brother works for the company or it would've been 1 star. Overcomplicated and underwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WAY better than a wrist band type item
customer_reviews.text: I learned a lot about my sleep pattern and was able to improvey sleep almost immediately using the advice from the App based on analysis
customer_reviews.author: Julia E.

customer_reviews.title: Sleep machine
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative if you cannot afford a expensive sleep machine.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Would make a great gift (but you need a modern cell phone as blue tooth receiver)
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing instrument, although neither my wife nor I can figure out why our feelings of refreshing sleep do not correlate with its score.
customer_reviews.author: GHumour

customer_reviews.title: Improve your sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have started to use it a month ago and I definitely would recommend it for anybody who would like to understand own sleep patterns and ways of improving it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cool product. It's great that you don't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool product. It's great that you don't have to wear any devices or put anything on the bed. It seems very accurate as I check the clock when I wake up and compare it to the chart the next day. My girlfriend hates it because I'm always accusing her of sabotaging my sleep score. I'm now a competitive sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Only issue is that about once a week the connection is lost. But it’s an easy reboot. Lots of data tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well. Very few times has it lost signal
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Very few times has it lost signal. We have a dog who is in and out of the bed and he doesn't interfere. Metrics and advice are good for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I like the daily sleep advice the app offers based on ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a couple months now. I can't say definitively how accurate it is, but the readings do seem to reflect how I intuitively feel the previous night's sleep went. I'm not sure how it senses your sleep patterns from the nightstand, but during the pre-sleep questionnaire you can see the real-time breathing patterns... and it seems to work. I like the daily sleep advice the app offers based on the night's sleep, and after so many readings you can get a more comprehensive report to print and take to your doctor. Thumbs up for that!
customer_reviews.author: heatherbree23

customer_reviews.title: it's not easy. I think choosing a sleep tracker is very ...
customer_reviews.text: This product helped me track my sleep for awhile while I was having trouble sleeping. I'm not sure it's so accurate, even when I'm in bed trying to fall asleep or awake in the morning, it thought I was sleeping. I think that it gave me a rough idea of how much I was sleeping, and I'm grateful for that. I tried traveling with it, but between the frame and cord, it's not easy. I think choosing a sleep tracker is very individual and that you need to just look at what will work for you. This is a great choice for people who don't want to wear a bracelet to bed but it also has its drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate, very very accurate. the only downside is the cell phone must be on all night also with a charger connected, that is why only 4 stars. Very pleased otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: ALADAR

customer_reviews.title: App required
customer_reviews.text: I thought the data I was getting from this product was interesting, but the app stopped working a few months back and continues to give an error message. I've tried on multiple Android devices old and new. The product does not function without the companion app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t activate, product discontinued!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device a while back and now need to reactivate the app on my new phone. Guess what, it’s not possible. Looks like ResMed shut down the backend service essentially turning the device into a brick.
customer_reviews.author: Hakan Eren

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was not all all accurate. Kept saying that I slept all nite when I was wide awake.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Albin

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good product, given the variable reviews. Clear, colorful graphs of previous night's sleep, including REM, light & deep sleep, and wake times. Helpful advice together with comparison to ideal sleep. Totally non-invasive. Very easy set-up. Perhaps the complaints about excess data use could be solved by denying ResMes permission to write or read your info. Be careful, these buttons occur during sign-in. Shutting out ResMed from your data does not interfere with function of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I wish it gave information on how to achieve better sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying the data and read out from the monitor. However, the technology is very finicky, often requiring a full disconnect and reinstall to re-pair with bluetooth. I wish it gave information on how to achieve better sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tracker!
customer_reviews.text: So accurate! I lay very still so I won't wake my hubby but this tracks when I'm awake, and different types of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Wally1975

customer_reviews.title: Is as described but having issued with it. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Is as described but having issued with it. It could be technical that I do not how to handle, but when I wake it will day it stopped incorrectly, seems to disconnect during the night. So far it has been pointless since I am not getting try readings.
customer_reviews.author: D Davis

customer_reviews.title: Neat gadget
customer_reviews.text: Neat gadget. I’ve had sleep apnea for six years and this monitors my sleep and lets me know exactly what’s happening so I can have confidence when I go to any reviews with the hospital
customer_reviews.author: dave9984

customer_reviews.title: t app does not work with android 7.0
customer_reviews.text: It app does not work with android 7.0. and you know what without android app it can do nothing. now, this is 50$ garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Veha Suwatphisankij

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I had a little problem with the app. The tech support took way too long to get back to me. So, I erased the program and reloaded it and the second time it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Barzins

customer_reviews.title: Quite  good
customer_reviews.text: Interesting data. ONly issue is, it can't tell if I get up and leave the bed. I wish there was a button on the app to tell it I couldn;'t sleep so I got up.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Software are out-dated and doesn't allow download outside the US ...
customer_reviews.text: Software are out-dated and doesn't allow download outside the US. The device work as described and is accurate close enough.
customer_reviews.author: lraviel381

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: I have found feedback from using the S+ extremely helpful in correcting my difficulty sleepIng. The feedback from the S+ exceeds the of other sleep monitoring devices that I've tried such as the Fitbit and Jawbone. I have been sleeping better since my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Ken

customer_reviews.title: Works even better than I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Works even better than I had hoped. Easy setup and fast accurate readings and useful analysis. Has changed my life for the better. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! No idea how you can write a negative review about this product. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't let me use the device
customer_reviews.text: Won't let me log in. Password help says "Something went wrong." Reinstalling app doesn't help.
customer_reviews.author: a Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device great price
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, can't beat the price, has helped identify sleep issues and offered solutions. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular feedback each morning!!!
customer_reviews.text: I take medication to settle my mind to sleep but was feeling so fatigued in the daytime. I'm a young 57 year old female that still does a physical job. Using it in just four days I see why I'm tired and even though you think you know everything about sleep hygiene we all don't stick to a plan. Here is a score every morning and a graph now I know I'm not crazy!!! I have been sleeping like S..T. It's is so simple to use and you notice the higher the sleep score your not a zombie by noon. I don't do reviews by sleep is so important for my medical condition BUY IT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth T

customer_reviews.title: The device & software would be better if it synced up with CPAP data & if ...
customer_reviews.text: The device & software would be better if it synced up with CPAP data & if software displayed the actual clock time when REM, light & deep sleep occurred . If ResMed Philips incorporated these features, 5 stars would be indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: No accurate
customer_reviews.text: I've tested this for a month. Overall, the device probably makes myself feel better about my sleep quality than I really do. For example, on my multiple ocassions where I was awake (for 5-10min), the device treat that as having "R.E.M." sleep, and did not mark that as "awake". I want something that's more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Zeo capablity for 1/5th the cost.
customer_reviews.text: This does all that the Zeo did ... Sleep and Awake times, Light Sleep, REM Sleep, Deep Sleep... with graphs and history and tips Since it offloads the computer to your Smart Phone, the cost is really low. Since their is nothing to attach to you, it is Very Comfortable. It use Blue Tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Myers

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: This device claims to give you useful data on how you sleep, but it does not. The score it uses to rate how well you slept appears driven largely by how long you tell it you slept for. It then gives you a bar graph with no useful data included. It's fun for a couple of days, but then once you realize that it doesn't offer anything beyond a way to track how long you say that you slept, the novelty wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is high tech. It is much fancier than I thought and very good quality. It works so well, I'm amazed.
customer_reviews.author: overshopper

customer_reviews.title: Truly great!
customer_reviews.text: My Fitbit health tracker has very simple sleep tracking. I needed much more detailed awareness of my sleep patterns and this item worked far better than I had dreamed it would. S+ By Resmed is flawless!
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. It is very accurate & helpful
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. It is very accurate & helpful. Gives great info & feedback. Helped me under my sleep much better & gives helpful tips
customer_reviews.author: KBT

customer_reviews.title: and it is nice to have a decent tracker informing me of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed what this thing can do! I always knew I had sleeping issues, and it is nice to have a decent tracker informing me of my sleeping habits.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: S+ ResMed Personal Sleep Solution Review.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this machine for a month. I am able to get an empirical review of my nightly sleep quality. This information lets me know when I need to get extra sleep. Too, the sound options help with relaxation so that I am better able to go to sleep more easily. I recommend this machine: it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Interesting data, I still sleep poorly though! Not ...
customer_reviews.text: Interesting data, I still sleep poorly though! Not a fan of having to hook into my cell phone to make the system work. Cell phones do not belong in the bedroom at night while trying to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Track Willy

customer_reviews.title: I does somewhat accurate detection of the sleep phases. ...
customer_reviews.text: I does somewhat accurate detection of the sleep phases. Advises are rather obvious and did not help me. My biggest concern is the data it sends to their servers without your control - around 200 MBytes per night: what is the big brother doing in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Spot

customer_reviews.title: does it work ?
customer_reviews.text: i tested it over a week, i dont see any improvement in my sleep at all nor prove its working on data during deep sleep or light sleep. Returned, also the app is horrible design for user to interactive.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product has only worked 1-5% of the time. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: Meta4

customer_reviews.title: App Crashes on Android
customer_reviews.text: The Android app keeps crashing on my phone. Very disappointed. They haven't updated it since January '15. It really needs to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: MISSING POWER SUPPLY AND USB CABLE WHEN ARRIVED...?!
customer_reviews.text: WHEN I RECEIVED THIS PRODUCT (the S+) FROM RESMED, I FOUND THAT THE POWER SUPPLY UNIT AND USB CHARGING CABLE WERE NOT INCLUDED IN THE PACKAGE...? I ASSUME THAT THE PRODUCT SHIPS WITH ALL THOSE ITEMS INCLUDED, SO I WILL EITHER BE REQUESTING THAT RESMED FULFILL THE REMAINDER OF THE ORDER, OR RETURN IT SHORTLY. VERY ODD; LOOKING FORWARD TO RESMED'S EXPLANATION. IF THE $50 PRICE TAG DOESN'T INCLUDE THE POWER SUPPLY AND CABLE, THEN THAT'S HILARIOUS.
customer_reviews.author: M. HALTER

customer_reviews.title: This is such a fantastic idea.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fantastic idea...and would be really helpful IF it worked! Called for tech support 6 nights into monitoring my sleep. Even though I was wide awake it registered me in "light sleep", and another time I got up to use the bathroom and it recorded that I was in REM sleep. A couple of nights I had zero deep sleep and little REM. The tech was very unhelpful. Want my $$ back !
customer_reviews.author: Sopo64

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product Work great and I have improve my sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product Work great and I have improve my sleep after two week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Dobbelaere

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work in any place in the world!
customer_reviews.text: The application works ONLY in USA and Britain and not anywhere in the world! I had to send it back :(
customer_reviews.author: Hezy Levy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it if you don't live in US
customer_reviews.text: I never managed to use it because no app is available outside US. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: " Fantastic! Maybe I'm in the wrong App Store
customer_reviews.text: I do a search in the App Store for S+ by ResMed (it's the default keywords when I enter "resmed") and then I get the message "No results found." Fantastic! Maybe I'm in the wrong App Store? Maybe I should switch to the Windows '95 App Store.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Robinson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Never plugged it in. Warning in booklet not to use with oxygen, which many apnea patients have to have.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lang

customer_reviews.title: due to the fact purchased for my dad as a gift but he said he would not use it (felt like it was a gimack and would not work
customer_reviews.text: Unable to rate, due to the fact purchased for my dad as a gift but he said he would not use it (felt like it was a gimack and would not work, said he didn't see how it could help with the snoring).
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy Product, Shoddy Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit in March 2017 and it provided me with very helpful data for the first two months, with only a few glitches. Then, within two months -- and, notably, just outside of the return period -- the product stopped working. I have been e-mailing customer service for more than six months to try to troubleshoot, exchange my unit, arrange for a return, and I have received no response. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, too bad it doesn't work all the time
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it provides good information. But, you must be patient, only works some of the time. Many nights when I am ready to go to sleep, it will not connect with my phone. It will take up to 20-35 minuets to reset the device. Then, in the morning I get a message the unit did not sync. I then have to repeat all the steps of trying to reconnect. I should have listened to the reviews for the app.
customer_reviews.author: RBTech2

customer_reviews.title: Very spammy. Has to send you daily quips. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very spammy. Has to send you daily quips. "You didn't get enough sleep last night. Get more" "You got up too many times last night. Stop doing that." Only tracks how much caffeine and alcohol you intake and excercise. Should be able to add more items (pills, etc) Connecting to service/website/logging in takes forever.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer L Devereux

customer_reviews.title: Well it have some nice features. The only drawback is that the soothing ...
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting concept. I saw this on Dr. Oz and had to have it. Well it have some nice features. The only drawback is that the soothing noises are not too soothing. They are a little staticy. Other than that, it's nice to see how much and how well I sleep. Nice gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It's giving me a better understanding of why I don't sleep well and helps me to work on the things I should, or shouldn't, be doing. I would give it 5 stars if it could actually get my mind to shut up, or off, so I could get back to sleep when I wake up in the middle of the night. :) Now that would be a real sleep solution.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: it worked great till it quit 3 months later
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product in June...it worked great till it quit 3 months later. They did have good reviews. Have e-mailed support twice without respsonse. They do not return warranty requests. There is no phone number to call. Definitely not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: avcowan

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Check Product compatability before you purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift from my wife because of my sleep problems. Although it connected with my phone a Galaxy Note 5, it could not record my sleep patterns. I received no feedback from it and at times would disconnect by itself over night. What their product description does not tell you is that it does not work with all smartphones and apparently mine is one of them. That information is in their user manual, unfortunately a little too late. This product may work wonderfully but the product description should have warned people to check whether their phones were compatible with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin C

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. The iPhone App doesn't work at all... their supports says "weeks away" from a fix
customer_reviews.text: The app doesn't work even to allow setup, despite multiple tries. Here is their response to my support request: "We are working on some bug with the S+ app and there are known issues going on with the app currently. There were updates recently in Android & Apple Store and our S+ app were effected due to the change of new apk rules. Our developers are working on to fix the issue and to make it compatible with the latest updated OS. This process will take weeks as we need to reprogram and get appropriate approvals before going live."
customer_reviews.author: Nostromo

customer_reviews.title: App no longer available - device not support by manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well until it didn't. The app wouldn't sync. Tried to reinstall the app but it's no longer available on either Android or Apple sites. Looks like I have a fancy doorstop at this point. Resmed website doesn't even mention this devise anymore. I can understand a company wanting to discontinue a product, but it's just a shame that they take your money and leave you hanging out to dry.
customer_reviews.author: RJH in TPA

product_meta.title: ResMed S+ By Personal Sleep Solution
feature_bullets: Use: S+ by ResMed Personal Sleep Solution has cutting-edge programs to help you sleep better

Features: Sensors in S+ detect key factors that affect your sleep environment including loud sounds, light levels and temperature. These are analyzed along with how they impact your sleep to produce customized suggestions for helping you to get a better night's sleep
Function: S+ tells you what's influencing your sleep patterns and helps you to improve them
Other: Delivers personalized feedback on your sleep habits, bedroom environment and lifestyle

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
